about_the_game:
Subdue the party members and the people. Change the destiny of China and the nation. Conquer space and your neighbours. This add-on will unlock a wealth of new content for you, including:

- Space Science and Events
- New foreign policy opportunities
- New domestic events
- More solutions and endings

Make China Great!
detailed_description:
Subdue the party members and the people. Change the destiny of China and the nation. Conquer space and your neighbours. This add-on will unlock a wealth of new content for you, including:

- Space Science and Events
- New foreign policy opportunities
- New domestic events
- More solutions and endings

Make China Great!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Mao's legacy: Bombard The Headquarters

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Mao's legacy: Bombard The Headquarters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 8, 8.1, Windows 10, etc (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Subdue the party members and the people. Change the destiny of China and the nation. Conquer space and your neighbours.
